properties.areaDesc: Long Island Sound East of New Haven CT/Port Jefferson NY; Peconic and Gardiners Bays; South Shore Bays from Jones Inlet through Shinnecock Bay
properties.headline: Storm Warning issued February 6 at 8:22PM EST until February 7 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Upton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 kt with gusts up to 50 kt. Seas
of 5 to 8 feet expected on Eastern Long Island Sound.

* WHERE...Long Island Sound East of New Haven CT/Port Jefferson
NY, Peconic and Gardiners Bays and South Shore Bays from Jones
Inlet through Shinnecock Bay.

* WHEN...From 10 AM to 7 PM EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Very strong winds will cause hazardous seas which
could capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should remain in port, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 7 PM EST FRIDAY
